egon121 - I know how to fix that problem. When you click on "download this torrent", you should see a list of files. Some of them are unchecked, that's why you didn't download them. All you have to do is click "download this torrent" again and check only the files you are missing and paste them into the appropriate folder. It happened to me as well.
